hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'A'ish bin Anas that 'Ali said:"I was a man who had a lot of prostatic discharge, so I told 'Ammar bin Yasir to ask the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) (about it) because his daughter was married to me. He said: 'Wudu' is sufficient for that

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَنْقُضُ الْوُضُوءَ وَمَا لاَ يَنْقُضُ الْوُضُوءَ مِنَ الْمَذْىِ
chapter.eng-name: What Invalidates Wudu' And What Does Not Invalidate Wudu' Of Madhi (Prostatic Fluid)
